game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with repairing the fabric of reality. As they journey through ancient civilizations and futuristic metropolises, they must uncover the secrets behind a mysterious phenomenon known as 'The Great Devouring'. With each step, they unravel the threads of time, revealing hidden histories and confronting their own mortality.
game.beginning: Players find themselves in the midst of a cataclysmic event: The Great Devouring. Their city is being consumed by a swirling vortex of energy, and as they emerge from the chaos, they meet an enigmatic guide who sets them on a quest to repair time itself.
game.ending: Ultimately, players must confront the mastermind behind The Great Devouring and make a choice that will reshape the course of history. Will they choose to restore the original timeline, preserving memories but erasing their own identity? Or will they forge a new path, embracing the consequences of altering time forever?
